name: Dungeon Quest (itch) (retronix)
description:
Help the brave Knight Edgar escape from the dungeon.

Collect all the keys to open the door and enter the portal.

Avoid the guards and the deadly spikes.

Keys: 

Z/X - Left /Right 

K/M - Up/Down

A simple maze game with ten screens.

For the ZX Spectrum 48K  using Boriels Basic.

Thanks for looking!
